title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 537.3 - Public order rules applicable to all others
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 537.3 - Public order rules applicable to all others

State Regulations

In compliance with section
6450
of the

Education Law, the rules of the board of trustees for the maintenance of public
order, as contained in Part 535 of this Title, shall apply to all students who
are not enrolled as cadets, faculty staff, visitors and other persons whether
or not they are authorized to be present on the college grounds, buildings, training vessel or any area assigned to the Maritime College that is used in
teaching, research, professional training, administration, recreation, athletics or student services and activities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
537.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
